job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: We are seeking a Software Engineer who will be responsible for developing and maintaining one of our communitysupported products You will have the exciting challenge of designing and building robust and scalable software using a cuttingedge technology stack as we seek to unlock the value of our music data and modernize our products and user experience The role works as part of an Engineering team and assists this team with estimation and prioritization of development efforts participating in architectural planning discussions  Our engineers tackle highly complex technical challenges in collaboration with our product and design teams to solve for a variety of problems ranging in complexity and scope  Our engineers have an opportunity to make significant impacts to our architecture and product features as well as our performance and scalability   brNeed to HavebrbrBachelors degree BABS from fouryear college or university in mathcomputer science related field or equivalent work experience brExtensive experience working with production systems troubleshooting performance tuning optimizing refactoring etcbrExtensive experience with Python and MySQLbrDeep understanding of Software Engineering processes such as version control build and configuration management automated deployments automated testing etcbrNice to HavebrbrKnowledge of Javascript React and eCommerce applications would be a plusbrPossess knowledge of the functions operation and mission of the businessbrComfort working in an agile software development process that is highly agile and iterativebrAbility to operate by Discogs principles ofbrResults driven Relentlessly pursue our goals and honor our commitmentsbrCommunication Ask questions share observations state factsbrAdaptability Embrace failure through experiential learning move forwardbrImpact Contribute to the story of Discogs success
